Special: Tearing, Accurate

Note: Weapon is made to use custom "Hellfire" Rounds, if used at the beginning of the target's next turn they take 1d5 Energy Damage that ignores armour. Note: Whilst the gist of this weapon was created by ChatGPT, it had to be heavily refined into something that makes sense.
